articles.author: Liz Sly
articles.title: Iran has vowed revenge against the U.S. But it seems to be in no hurry
articles.description: Iran has many options to strike back. The quandary is to avoid an all-out war.
articles.content:
That Iran will retaliate is not in question, analysts say. Not to do so would be a sign of weakness that could jeopardize the enormous influence Iran has gained in the region over the past four decades.
The targeted killing of Soleimani eroded the deterrent … [+7549 chars]

articles.title: Redskins hire a respected trainer, part of Ron Rivera’s plan to bring back Trent Williams
articles.description: The new coach wants the former Pro Bowl left tackle back in the fold. Bringing on a new trainer could be a first step.
articles.content:
One of Rons top goals is to get Trent back, the person said, speaking on the condition of anonymity because the Redskins had not announced the staff addition. I know for certain that Ron is going to try to get him back.

articles.author: Gene Wang
articles.title: Virginia routs Virginia Tech by taking away what Hokies do best - The Washington Post
articles.description: Kihei Clark scored a career-high 18 points and the Cavaliers’ signature defense did the rest in an easy victory over their in-state rival.
articles.content: In limiting the ACCs top three-point shooting outfit to 16 percent (4 for 25) from behind the arc, Virginia (11-2, 3-0) maintained a hold of at a least a tie for first place in the conference standings by pulling away in the second half in front of an announc… [+4039 chars]

articles.author: Joseph Wilson | AP
articles.title: Barcelona held 2-2 at last-place Espanyol in Catalan derby
articles.description: China forward Wu Lei scored late to give Espanyol a 2-2 draw against 10-man Barcelona in Saturday’s Catalan capital derby between the best and worst teams in the Spanish league
articles.content: The Spanish league said Wu is the first Chinese player to score against Barcelona. The substitute got the equalizer for Espanyol with two minutes remaining after Luis Suárez had played a key role in putting Barcelona 2-1 ahead. Espanyol was helped when Barcel… [+1296 chars]

articles.author: Seung Min Kim
articles.title: The White House has formally notified Congress of the Soleimani strike
articles.description: The notification is required by law under the War Powers Act.
articles.content:
Heres what you need to know to understand what this moment means in U.S.-Iran relations.
What happened: President Trump ordered a drone strike near the Baghdad airport, killing Maj. Gen. Qasem Soleimani, one of Irans top military figures and leader of its sp… [+1382 chars]

articles.author: Greg Porter
articles.title: P.M. Update: Evening showers and temperatures dropping overnight
articles.description: Winds pick up and temperatures fall into the 30s overnight.
articles.content: It has been another mild day in a winter full of mild weather. Showers and pockets of patchy fog put a damper on the first Saturday evening of January. After the passing of a potent cold front overnight, Sunday will feel like a much more traditional winter da… [+1058 chars]
